mapper.sql: id, o_id, sh_name, sh_dis, sh_price, sh_number, sh_pic, sh_msg, c_time, u_time, status, sh_id
mapper.update: update m_shopping set o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sh_name = #{shName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sh_dis = #{shDis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sh_price = #{shPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sh_number = #{shNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sh_pic = #{shPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sh_msg = #{shMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_time = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sh_id = #{shId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
